title: Morning Routine on Zen Dairy Goats Farm

subtasks: Greeting the animals upon waking.

building rapport with the cow (Bernie) through familiarity greetings.

tasks.task: Milking a dairy cow** with the following subtasks:

Caring for dairy livestock** (checking on the health and general wellbeing of the cows) and **MAINTASK: Using and maintaining milking equipment** (ensuring towels and washcloths are clean, the milking cup is in good condition).

Interacting with farm animals** (greeting the cows and observing their behavior, like the “waddle” mentioned). These tasks involve physical actions such as cleaning, extracting milk, and monitoring the animals, which are directly relevant to the physical tasks expected on a farm. Thus, the transcript is relevant and the generated tasks accurately reflect the said activities.
